data.eml:eml: A new species of the genus Rapturella (Gastropoda: Acteonidae) from southeast Brazil

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Cunha, Carlo M., Simone, Luiz Ricardo L. (2018): A new species of the genus Rapturella (Gastropoda: Acteonidae) from southeast Brazil. Zootaxa 4521 (1): 125-128, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4521.1.7
